name: mathspace
title: Mathspace
description: View mathspace tasks and other stuff easily
author: ingowolf

commands.name: assigned-tasks
commands.title: Assigned Tasks
commands.description: A list of your assigned tasks

commands.name: information
commands.title: Information
commands.description: Show user info, XP, coins, etc

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
